html:
SAN FRANCISCO, Nov 12 (Reuters) - A group of Amazon workers in New York City's Staten Island has withdrawn a petition to organize a union, a spokeswoman for the U.S. National Labor Relations Board confirmed on Friday.


(Reporting by Jeffrey Dastin and Julia Love
Editing by Chris Reese)

(( peter.henderson@thomsonreuters.com ; 323 251 4827; ))
